page.title: 02Ogston Reservoir -recreation
page.content:
The reservoir is one of the area's tourist attractions for a number of reasons.{ { {Recreational Ogston Sailing Club uses the reservoir mainly during the summer season. The club is a private one although non-club members may watch from the nearby car park and{picnic area.There are regular race meetings which are exciting to watch. { Sailing}courses are run regularly for those wishing to gain inshore sailing certificates. Local schools and colleges have access to the facilities during term time. The reservoir is also available for{windsurfing.
Each year around May the 'Ogston Sailing Club Open Day' is an enjoyable event for all.
